visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a semi-circle item chart showing the distribution of seats in the German Parliament (Bundestag) after the 2021 election. The chart should have a title 'Distribution of seats' and a subtitle with a link to the source data. The chart should include a legend with formatted labels showing the party name and the number of seats in a semi-transparent style. The data series should include the name of each party, the number of seats, a custom color for each party, and a label for each data point. The chart should be styled with specific colors, font sizes, and styles for labels, axes, and titles. Additionally, the chart should be responsive, adjusting the data labels' distance when the chart width is less than 600px.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a semi-circle item chart to visualize the distribution of seats in the German Parliament after the 2021 election. The chart is titled 'Distribution of seats' and includes a subtitle with a link to the source data. The legend is formatted to display the party name and the number of seats in a semi-transparent style. The data series includes the name of each party, the number of seats, a custom color for each party, and a label for each data point. The chart is styled with specific colors, font sizes, and styles for labels, axes, and titles. The chart is also responsive, adjusting the data labels' distance when the chart width is less than 600px to ensure readability on smaller screens.
